title: Develop Reward Display UI
description: Create a UI component to display all rewards (ELO, gold) on the reward screen.
implementation_notes: Ensure the UI is visually clear and accessible. Use sys_001 to fetch reward data dynamically.

title: Integrate Reward Data with UI
description: Connect the reward display UI to the backend system to show real-time reward information.
implementation_notes: Work with sys_001 to ensure accurate and timely updates of reward values in the UI.

title: Design Attractive Reward Presentation
description: Enhance the visual appeal of rewards to make them more enticing for players.
implementation_notes: Use animations or visual effects to highlight rewards. Validate design with player feedback to meet acceptance criteria.

title: Implement Double Rewards Button
description: Add a 'Double' button to the reward screen that allows players to double their rewards by watching ads.
implementation_notes: Integrate ad-serving functionality via sys_001. Ensure the button is prominently placed and functional as per the design reference image.

title: Test Double Rewards Feature
description: Verify that the 'Double' button correctly doubles rewards after an ad is watched.
implementation_notes: Perform end-to-end testing with various ad scenarios. Confirm that sys_001 handles reward multiplication accurately.
